core.controller.response(response={}, status=200, mimetype=None, page=1, lenght=1000)[source]¶

Generate default json resonse for controller. :param response: data to return in request :param status: code of response example : 200 it`s mean response OK :param mimetype: :param page: information of with page of data is return :param lenght: how meny page is with data :return:
